text: You are the guardian of Cathay's northern border, but Tzeentch's armies have breached the Snake Gate, defiling Cathayan lands. Restore your honor and destroy them!
Indeed, my lord, a rift has appeared at the Great Bastion. Tzeentch's forces have overrun the ruins of the Snake Gate and occupied the Terracotta Graveyard.

The Turtle Gate has fallen into the hands of [[sl:campaign_chaos]]Chaos[[/sl]]! Reclaim this mighty bastion swiftly to safeguard the [[sl:campaign_cathay]]Celestial Empire[[/sl]]. It is your duty as a guardian of the Great Bastion!\\n\\n{{tr:hp_campaign_point_1_great_bastion}}\\n\\n{{tr:hp_campaign_great_bastion_learn_more}}
Such efforts are praiseworthy, but what’s next? I’m hungry, and those Cathayans cowering in the Turtle Gate must be delicious…
That is Cathay's Great Bastion. As per your plans, the servants of the Changer of Ways have seized the Snake Gate and infiltrated the Dragon Empire.
The threat level at the Great Bastion has increased! Chaos is gathering at the [[b]]Snake Gate[[/b]], and an attack is imminent!
The threat level at the Great Bastion has increased! Chaos is gathering at the [[b]]Turtle Gate[[/b]], and an attack is imminent!
The threat level at the Great Bastion has increased! Chaos is gathering at the [[b]]Dragon Gate[[/b]], and an attack is imminent!
The Cathayan [[sl:campaign_factions]]factions[[/sl]] must hold the Snake Gate, Dragon Gate, and Turtle Gate to halt Chaos from invading Cathayan lands.
This tower stands at the heart of Cathay, a beacon of the Dragon Emperor's glory.
Thick walls and towering spires form an impenetrable fortress.
Grand palaces symbolize wealth and the supreme authority of the Celestial Dragon Emperor.
The Heavenly City stands above the capital, a radiant symbol of Cathay’s glory, inspiring reverence among all.
'Majestic' falls short of describing this world-renowned city’s splendor—a home of endless wonders and the Dragon Emperor's throne.
Once the most magnificent city in existence, Wei Jin now lies in ruins, its countless marvels buried beneath rubble and ash.
